How do I get this to the north pole without exploding?

ROFL!! Love it!! Very Kerbal. It actually looks fantastic.

Now, to answer seriously, this is what I would do but there is probably an easier way:

- launch a one-part space dock into LKO (part of the orbit construction mod)

- when the space dock is 'established' you can edit the space dock inventory (this is cheating) so that you have a lot of parts (set mass = 1000)

- stick a 'spacebuilt' part on your creation in the VAB (part of the orbit construction mod)

- ship 'teleports' into LKO next to your spacedock

- de-orbit your creation using MechJeb so you get a precise and careful landing.

- win

- post screenshots

- more win

-
Or you can do the above method, but replace step 2 with; When the space dock is established, run supply missions to build your massive craft in orbit.
Add wheels, jet engines and a lot of fuel and drive it to the north pole.

You could put this into orbit by releasing craft from launch clamp, then stop the game and change craft orbital parameters in persistence file (you could put some dummy object on orbit for Ctrl+V orbital information and removing it).
